title: Episode 185: Can I fart in front of you though? (Feat. Ari Lennox)
itunes:title: Episode 185: Can I fart in front of you though? (Feat. Ari Lennox)
description:
Singer/songwriter Ari Lennox joins the ladies of Lip Service this week. She opens up about getting aggressive in the bedroom, recklessly wanting children, her obsession with her dog, and much more. Enjoy! ***LIVE SHOW ALERT*** When: Thursday, March 28, 2019 at 7:30pm Where: Carolines on Broadway - NYC Link: https://www.ticketweb.com/event/lip-service-live-carolines-on-broadway-tickets/9143565

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
